reviewText: I bought this Hentai cause it was cheap and looked interesting. There's a nice story to it when a boy named Seiichi moves into the Kazehana to get some peace and quiet as he studies for his exams. He discovers however, that the lonely widow that runs the Inn is into extreme sex play, much to his fascination. Together they engage in various acts of bondage and discipline much to their mutual enjoyment. Seiichi was banned from his home when his father found he was using bondage on his step-mother. Later his step-sister moves into the inn with him and his step-mother comes to protect her and instead she becomes part of his fantasies yet again and with his new wife Miyuiki the widow of the inn.
